mapper.select: /* scmActivityFundMapper.selectTaxCodeScmActivityFundFlag */ SELECT TAX_CODE , INDUSTRY_CODE||' '||'('||TAX_NAME||')' AS TAX_NAME FROM FCM0007C WHERE SCM_FUND_FLAG = 'X'

/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectNextClmNo */ SELECT 'J5' || TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') || NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 7, 4) + 1), 'FM0000'), '0001') AS CLM_NO FROM FCM0019M WHERE SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 3, 4) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') AND CLM_TYPE = 'J5'
mapper.insert:
/* scmActivityFundMapper.insertScmActivityFundExp */
INSERT INTO FCM0019M ( CLM_NO ,CLM_TYPE ,COST_CENTR ,COST_CENTR_NAME ,MEM_ACC_ID ,BANK_CODE ,BANK_ACC_NO ,CLM_MONTH ,TOT_AMT ,APPV_PRCSS_NO ,CRT_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,UPD_DT ,UPD_USER_ID ) values ( #{clmNo} ,'J5' ,UPPER(#{costCentr}) ,NVL(#{costCentrName}, (SELECT COST_CENTER_TEXT FROM FCM0008M WHERE COST_CENTER = UPPER(#{costCentr}))) ,UPPER(#{memAccId}) ,#{bankCode} ,#{bankAccNo} ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{clmMonth}, 'MM/YYYY'), 'YYYYMM') ,#{allTotAmt} ,#{appvPrcssNo} ,SYSDATE ,#{userId} ,SYSDATE ,#{userId} )
mapper.select: /* scmActivityFundMapper.selectNextClmSeq */ SELECT NVL(MAX(CLM_SEQ) + 1, 1) AS CLM_SEQ FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}

/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectScmActivityFundItems */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T3.COST_CENTR, T3.COST_CENTR_NAME, T3.MEM_ACC_ID, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T4.MEM_ACC_ID AS SUPPLIR, T1.SUPPLIR AS SUPPLIR_NAME, T1.INVC_TYPE, ( CASE T1.INVC_TYPE WHEN 'F' THEN 'Full Tax invoice' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Simplified Tax invoice' END ) AS INVC_TYPE_NAME, T1.INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(T1.INVC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT, T1.GST_RGIST_NO, T1.TAX_CODE, T2.TAX_NAME, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T1.EXP_DESC, T1.CLAM_UN, T3.TOT_AMT AS ALL_TOT_AMT, T3.APPV_PRCSS_NO FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0007C T2 ON T1.TAX_CODE = T2.TAX_CODE LEFT JOIN FCM0019M T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T4 ON T1.SUPPLIR = T4.MEM_ACC_NAME WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} ORDER BY T1.CLM_SEQ

/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectScmActivityFundInfo */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T3.COST_CENTR, T3.COST_CENTR_NAME, T3.MEM_ACC_ID, T4.MEM_ACC_NAME, T3.BANK_CODE, T4.BANK_NAME, T3.BANK_ACC_NO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T3.CLM_MONTH, 'YYYYMM'), 'MM/YYYY') AS CLM_MONTH, T3.TOT_AMT AS ALL_TOT_AMT, T3.APPV_PRCSS_NO, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T5.MEM_ACC_ID AS SUPPLIR, T1.SUPPLIR AS SUPPLIR_NAME, T1.INVC_TYPE, T1.INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(T1.INVC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT, T1.GST_RGIST_NO, T1.TAX_CODE, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T1.EXP_DESC, T2.CAR_MILAG_DT, T2.LOC_FROM, T2.LOC_TO, T2.CAR_MILAG, T2.CAR_MILAG_AMT, T2.TOLL_AMT, T2.PARKING_AMT, T2.PURPOSE FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0021D T2 ON T1.CLM_NO = T2.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0019M T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T4 ON T3.MEM_ACC_ID = T4.MEM_ACC_ID LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T5 ON T1.SUPPLIR = T4.MEM_ACC_NAME WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND T1.CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}

/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectScmActivityFundItemGrp */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T1.TAX_CODE, T2.TAX_NAME, T2.TAX_RATE, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.CLAM_UN, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0007C T2 ON T1.TAX_CODE = T2.TAX_CODE WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND CLAM_UN = #{clamUn}

/* scmActivityFundMapper.selectAttachList */ SELECT T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,T1.ATCH_FILE_ID ,T2.ATCH_FILE_NAME FROM SYS0070M T1 LEFT JOIN SYS0071D T2 ON T1.ATCH_FILE_ID = T2.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{atchFileGrpId} ORDER BY T1.ATCH_FILE_ID
mapper.delete: /* staffClaimMapper.deleteScmActivityFundExpItem */ DELETE FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}
mapper.update: /* staffClaimMapper.updateScmActivityFundExpTotAmt */ UPDATE FCM0019M SET TOT_AMT = #{allTotAmt} WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FCM0019M ( CLM_NO, CLM_TYPE, COST_CENTR, COST_CENTR_NAME, MEM_ACC_ID, BANK_CODE, BANK_ACC_NO, CLM_MONTH, TOT_AMT, /*,APPV_PRCSS_NO*/ CRT_DT, CRT_USER_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USER_ID, PREV_CLM_NO ) SELECT #{newClmNo}, CLM_TYPE, COST_CENTR, COST_CENTR_NAME, MEM_ACC_ID, BANK_CODE, BANK_ACC_NO, CLM_MONTH, TOT_AMT, /* APPV_PRCSS_NO */ SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, CLM_NO AS PREV_CLM_NO FROM FCM0019M WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}

INSERT INTO FCM0020D ( CLM_NO ,CLM_SEQ ,INVC_DT ,INVC_TYPE ,INVC_NO ,SUPPLIR ,GST_RGIST_NO ,INVC_REM ,EXP_TYPE ,EXP_TYPE_NAME ,GL_ACC_CODE ,GL_ACC_CODE_NAME ,BUDGET_CODE ,BUDGET_CODE_NAME ,TAX_CODE ,NET_AMT ,TAX_AMT ,TAX_NON_CLM_AMT ,TOT_AMT ,ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,EXP_DESC ,CLAM_UN ,CRT_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,UPD_DT ,UPD_USER_ID ) SELECT #{newClmNo}, CLM_SEQ, INVC_DT, INVC_TYPE, INVC_NO, SUPPLIR, GST_RGIST_NO, INVC_REM, EXP_TYPE, EXP_TYPE_NAME, GL_ACC_CODE, GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, BUDGET_CODE, BUDGET_CODE_NAME, TAX_CODE, NET_AMT, TAX_AMT, TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, TOT_AMT, ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, EXP_DESC, CLAM_UN, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId} FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}
